√vyac 'extend'

present: [3.] viviktás etc.  vivyacanta   -- [6.] vicati  

perfect: vivyāca  vivyáktha  viveca?  vivicus  

[aorist: vicyāt  avyāci  avivyacat  avyacīt  avyācīt  vyaciṣyati  vyacitā  vicitā  vicita  vicitvā  vevic-  vāvyac-  vivyaciṣa-  vyācaya-  ]

derivatives: vyácas  vyáciṣṭha V.B.  vī́ci? V.  

Has a very suspicious likeness to √añc, ac + vi.
